title: Surprise ‘Black Swan’ Has Primed Crypto For A $3 Trillion Bitcoin, Ethereum And XRP Price Bombshell
author: Billy Bambrough
description: Dan Morehead, the influential founder of crypto investment company Pantera Capital, has called Ripple's claimed XRP legal victory "a positive black swan"...

title: Brine Fi Raises $16.5 Million As It Aims To Broaden The DEX Market
author: David Prosser
description: Brine Fi believes demand for decentralised exchanges will continue to grow amid concern about the security of centralised platforms

title: What Really Happened To LUNA Crypto?
author: Q.ai - Powering a Personal Wealth Movement
description: When $60 billion worth of digital currency gets wiped out, there will be an investigation, lawsuits, regulators, even an arrest warrant. Meanwhile, investors need to know why Luna was so vulnerable and what happened, step-by-step, so we won't get caught up in anything like this again.

title: What Are Algorithmic Stablecoins?
author: Nina Bambysheva
description: Stablecoins are digital assets designed to hold a certain value relative to a different asset, most commonly the U.S. dollar.

title: American Express Announces First Crypto Rewards Credit Card On Its Network
author: Nina Bambysheva
description: The card, developed in partnership with crypto wealth manager Abra, will transact in U.S. dollars and offer crypto back on any purchase category and amount. The rollout is expected later this year.

title: ‘We Can Rally Now’—The Fed’s $15 Trillion Reason Behind This Crypto Legend’s Sudden Flip After Huge XRP Bombshell Triggered A Bitcoin And Ethereum Price Boom
author: Billy Bambrough
description: The veteran founder of bitcoin fund manager Pantera Capital, Dan Morehead, has said bitcoin, ethereum, XRP and crypto more broadly are ready to rally...

title: African Crypto Startup Raises $30 Million To Build A Web3 WeChat
author: Nina Bambysheva
description: Jambo’s Series A funding round was led by crypto-focused venture capital giant Paradigm.

title: Coinbase NFT Partner 0x Labs Raises $70 Million From Greylock Partners, Jump Crypto, and Jared Leto
author: Nina Bambysheva
description: Following the successful integration with Coinbase’s newly launched NFT marketplace, the San-Francisco-based startup plans to dabble further into the NFT tech and decentralized finance.

title: Registrar Unstoppable Domains Raises $65 Million To Make Website Domains Into NFTs
author: Maria Gracia Santillana Linares
description: New unicorn offers users control of their data, takes IDs out of wallets.

title: In Bear Crypto Markets, All Roads Lead To Bitcoin
author: Lawrence Wintermeyer
description: Bitcoin might be the world’s strongest decentralized network, but is it the best candidate for hosting DeFi? Bear markets were made for building and all eyes are on The Merge. When the market rallies again, we’ll know whether DeFi and Bitcoin have a shared future or are destined to remain estranged.

title: Celsius Has Paid Its Debts To DeFi’s Biggest Lenders, Reclaiming Over $1 Billion In Collateral
author: Nina Bambysheva
description: The crypto lender borrowed big from Compound, Aave and Maker.

title: Antic’s Ethereum Approach To Co-Ownership Draws Interest From Reddit Founder
author: Maria Gracia Santillana Linares
description: Ohanian leads seed capital to Israeli company developing software for group acquisitions.

title: Crypto Venture Capitalist Breaks Down Likely Winners And Losers From Ethereum Merge
author: Steven Ehrlich
description: DeFi and other applications built on top of Ethereum are likely to benefit from the merge, while major competitors will see the challenge stiffen.

title: CryptoCodex: ‘Large Price Swings’—Crypto Braced For $9 Trillion Fed Earthquake As Bitcoin, Ethereum, BNB, XRP, Solana And Cardano Soar
author: Billy Bambrough
description: The following is an excerpt from the daily CryptoCodex email newsletter. Sign up now for free here...
